body.name: YCIA&DONE Bathroom Countertop Organizer Over The Faucet, Narrow Counter Organizer Above Sink, Table Mounted Faucet Sink Shelf for Bathroom, Kitchen, Toilet, Laundry(Amber Gold)
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Maximize Faucet Countertop Space】Our YCIA&DONE Faucet Shelf is designed to fit perfectly above narrow faucets, creating vertical storage and maximizing your limited space. It provides additional storage options for your bathroom, kitchen, laundry room, or restroom. Use it to organize toiletries, cosmetics, skincare products, perfume, laundry detergent, and dishwashing liquid

【Easy Installation and Convenience】Our over sink shelf is designed for easy installation and can be easily detached for cleaning purposes. The combination of metal rods and high-quality plastic ensures its durability and sturdiness. It's a practical solution for narrow faucet countertops in bathrooms, kitchens, and more, providing you with convenient access to your everyday essentials

【Stylish and Functional Design】In addition to its storage capabilities, our over toilet storage shelf serves as a decorative piece. The clean and luxurious color scheme adds a touch of understated luxury and vintage charm to your space. It enhances the overall aesthetic and functionality of your room
【Detailed Dimensions】We provide detailed dimensions to ensure our sink shelf fits perfectly above narrow faucets
【After-sale Service】Please feel free to contact us on Amazon if you have any further questions, we will help you solve the case within 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it in my bathroom to help organize my skin care products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually really love it, but despite doing measurements before ordering, it didn't fit my space. I was able to make it work by moving the base squares out so they only use 2 poles each rather than 4 and create a wider base. Either way, like that or as pictured and instructed,I found it to actually be very stable,easy to build, and held basically as much as my generic wire shelf did. It's a big upgrade and I'm very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many different models!
reviews.reviewText: YCIA&DONE have numerous bathroom organizers available in their store - make sure you look through to find the right product for your needs! I personally chose the Narrow, over the faucet, tiered organizer due to having limited space. The organizer was very easy to assemble - just pop in the sticks as shown in the accompanying diagram and voila! It is a sturdy product so long as you don't overload it with weight - I have about 4 full bottles of perfume on the top tier and it holds steady. Great selection of organizers available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for something that would fit on the back of my very small sink vanity. This is better suited for a single faucet sink but I'm still quite happy with the item. Very durable plastic with heavy pins. Had it together in about five minutes. Tip .. insert the metal rods into the two smaller pieces first. Flip the larger section upside down and insert. Otherwise, you'll likely become frustrated trying to line it all up. Would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Before and after. Life saver!
reviews.reviewText: I want to be honest. There's a constant battle with my wife over the living space in our bathroom. I don't know how or from where, but new jars, tubes, brushes, and other items that my wife claims are vital seem to appear on the sink with remarkable regularity. What you see in the photo is only a tenth of what is stored under the sink and in the bathroom itself. According to her, each jar and tube is essential and she uses them multiple times a day. So, getting them from the drawer or under the sink is very inconvenient for her.When I found these shelves, I was incredibly happy. The thing is, I constantly knock over these jars, and some of them end up on the floor or even in the sink, either spilling in the sink or breaking because my wife forgot to put the lids on. This purchase has been a lifesaver for me. Now, the space around the sink is clear, and I can wash up without fearing that I'll drop something on the floor, only to hear my wife later complain about the cost and how crucial it is for her to look beautiful every day.Men, if you want to make your wife happy, buy these shelves. Women, if you want to calm your husbands, buy these shelves.P.S. The assembly process took less than 3 minutes, and even a five-year-old can handle it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble but not very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: First, I wish this was wider, as my sink, like most sinks, have a dip around the faucet from the counter top itself. This makes it so that this holder doesn't fit firmly against the whole counter. It is very easy to assemble, but it honestly is not very sturdy at all. If you try to lift it up from anywhere other than the bottom pieces, whatever you're lifting it from will just come out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's sturdy, easy to setup, and looks good too...
reviews.reviewText: Fits nicely over the faucet and doesn't take up much room, yet offers some nice storage.The design is smart, making use of vertical space that is usually wasted.It's sturdy, easy to setup, and looks good too.Highly recommend for smaller bathrooms!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and space saving
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on my vanity over my makeup brush holder and can hold a lot more products than I originally thought it could! My counter has so much more space now which makes keeping it clean with kids in the house so much easier.
